comments: Creates an audit log with the message and user name (usually an email). Audit logs should be written anytime you
make changes to the FusionAuth database. When using the FusionAuth App web interface, any changes are automatically
written to the audit log. However, if you are accessing the API, you must write the audit logs yourself.

params.name: request
comments: The request object that contains all of the information used to create the audit log entry.
